original_text: And it came to pass, while they were in the way, that tidings came to David, saying, Absalom hath slain all the king's sons, and there is not one of them left.
korean_text: 그들이 길에 있을 때에 압살롬이 왕의 모든 아들들을 죽이고 하나도 남기지 아니하였다는 소문이 다윗에게 이르매

sentences.original_text: while they were in the way
Absalom hath slain all the king's sons
and there is not one of them left
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 사람도 남지 않았다
